mapper.insert: insert into e_inbound_entry( inbound_entry_id, entry_date, creation_date, total_cost, invoice_type, tax_rate, drawer, partner_company_id, department_id, warehouse_id, remark, classification, shipping_cost, shipping_cost_type, shipping_quantity, shipping_number, shipping_method_id ) values ( #{inboundEntryID}, #{entryDate}, date('now', 'localtime'), #{totalCost}, #{invoiceType}, #{taxRate}, #{drawer}, #{partnerCompanyID}, #{departmentID}, #{warehouseID}, #{remark}, #{classification}, #{shippingCost}, #{shippingCostType}, #{shippingQuantity}, #{shippingNumber}, #{shippingMethodID} )
mapper.select: select inbound_product_id, inbound_entry_id, p.sku_id, sku_full.code, sku_full.unit_name, sku_full.factory_code, quantity, p.stock_quantity, p.remark, warehouse_stock_id, warehouse_id, tax_rate, unit_price_without_tax, unit_price_with_tax, stock_unit_price, return_status, checkout_serial, invoice_serial from e_inbound_product as p join sku_full on p.sku_id = sku_full.sku_id where inbound_entry_id = #{id} order by inbound_product_id

select inbound_entry_id, shipping_cost, shipping_cost_type, shipping_number, shipping_method_id, c.abbreviated_name as relevant_company_name, i.remark from e_inbound_entry as i join c_relevant_company as c on i.shipping_method_id = c.relevant_company_id where inbound_entry_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update e_inbound_entry set shipping_cost = #{shippingCost}, shipping_cost_type = #{shippingCostType}, shipping_quantity = #{shippingQuantity}, shipping_number = #{shippingNumber}, shipping_method_id = #{shippingMethodID}, remark = #{remark}, is_modified = 1 where inbound_entry_id = #{inboundEntryID}
mapper.select: select inbound_entry_id, total_cost, invoice_type, tax_rate, drawer, i.department_id, d.name as department_name, i.remark from e_inbound_entry as i join e_department as d on i.department_id = d.department_id where inbound_entry_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update e_inbound_entry set total_cost = #{totalCost}, invoice_type = #{invoiceType}, department_id = #{departmentID}, remark = #{remark}, is_modified = 1 where inbound_entry_id = #{inboundEntryID}

update e_inbound_product set quantity = #{quantity}, remark = #{remark}, tax_rate = #{taxRate}, unit_price_without_tax = #{unitPriceWithoutTax}, unit_price_with_tax = #{unitPriceWithTax} where inbound_product_id = #{inboundProductID}

update e_inbound_entry set total_cost = #{totalCost}, invoice_type = #{invoiceType}, department_id = #{departmentID}, remark = #{remark}, return_date = date('now', 'localtime'), is_modified = 1 where inbound_entry_id = #{inboundEntryID}
update e_inbound_product set quantity = #{quantity}, return_status = 1 where inbound_product_id = #{inboundProductID}
mapper.select: select inbound_product_id, inbound_entry_id, p.sku_id, sku_full.code, sku_full.unit_name, sku_full.factory_code, quantity, p.stock_quantity, p.remark, warehouse_stock_id, warehouse_id, tax_rate, unit_price_without_tax, unit_price_with_tax, stock_unit_price, return_status, checkout_serial, invoice_serial from e_inbound_product as p join sku_full on p.sku_id = sku_full.sku_id where p.checkout_serial = #{checkoutSerial} order by inbound_product_id

select inbound_product_id, inbound_entry_id, p.sku_id, sku_full.code, sku_full.unit_name, sku_full.factory_code, quantity, p.stock_quantity, p.remark, warehouse_stock_id, warehouse_id, tax_rate, unit_price_without_tax, unit_price_with_tax, stock_unit_price, return_status, checkout_serial, invoice_serial from e_inbound_product as p join sku_full on p.sku_id = sku_full.sku_id where p.invoice_serial = #{invoiceSerial} order by inbound_product_id

select i.inbound_entry_id, i.entry_date, i.creation_date, i.partner_company_id, c.abbreviated_name as company_abbreviated_name, c.phone, c.full_name, i.remark, i.classification, i.shipping_cost, i.shipping_cost_type, i.shipping_quantity, i.shipping_number, i.shipping_method_id, r.abbreviated_name as relevant_company_name, i.shipping_cost_serial from (e_inbound_entry as i join c_partner_company as c on i.partner_company_id = c.partner_company_id) left join c_relevant_company as r on i.shipping_method_id = r.relevant_company_id where i.shipping_cost_serial = #{shippingCostSerial} order by i.inbound_entry_id desc

select c.partner_company_id, c.abbreviated_name, c.full_name, p.quantity, p.unit_price_with_tax from (e_inbound_entry as e join e_inbound_product as p on e.inbound_entry_id = p.inbound_entry_id) join c_partner_company as c on e.partner_company_id = c.partner_company_id where p.checkout_serial = ''

select c.partner_company_id, c.abbreviated_name, c.full_name, p.quantity, p.unit_price_with_tax from (e_inbound_entry as e join e_inbound_product as p on e.inbound_entry_id = p.inbound_entry_id) join c_partner_company as c on e.partner_company_id = c.partner_company_id where p.invoice_serial = '' and p.checkout_serial != ''

select inbound_product_id, inbound_entry_id, p.sku_id, sku_full.code, sku_full.unit_name, sku_full.factory_code, quantity, p.stock_quantity, p.remark, warehouse_stock_id, warehouse_id, tax_rate, unit_price_without_tax, unit_price_with_tax, stock_unit_price, return_status, checkout_serial, invoice_serial from e_inbound_product as p join sku_full on p.sku_id = sku_full.sku_id where p.warehouse_stock_id = #{id} order by inbound_product_id

select e.inbound_entry_id, e.entry_date, p.inbound_product_id, p.sku_id, p.quantity, p.stock_quantity, p.warehouse_stock_id, p.warehouse_id, p.unit_price_without_tax, p.stock_unit_price from e_inbound_entry as e join e_inbound_product as p on e.inbound_entry_id = p.inbound_entry_id where warehouse_stock_id = #{id}

select e.inbound_entry_id, e.entry_date, invoice_type, e.tax_rate, drawer, e.partner_company_id, c.abbreviated_name, e.department_id, e.warehouse_id, e.remark, e.classification, e.shipping_cost, e.shipping_cost_type, e.shipping_quantity, e.shipping_method_id, r.abbreviated_name as relevant_company_name, p.inbound_product_id, p.sku_id, s.code, s.unit_name, s.factory_code, p.quantity, p.warehouse_stock_id, p.unit_price_with_tax, p.unit_price_without_tax from e_inbound_entry as e join e_inbound_product as p on e.inbound_entry_id = p.inbound_entry_id join sku_full as s on p.sku_id = s.sku_id join c_partner_company as c on e.partner_company_id = c.partner_company_id left join c_relevant_company as r on e.shipping_method_id = r.relevant_company_id where s.tree_level like #{treeLevel}||'%'
